translated: and it is said in terms of the mere semblance of authorship. The knowledge of the four noble truths is the penetration of the four noble truths in the sense of their being the non-delusion of what is true. Understanding is the knowledge in the prior stage. Penetration is the penetration by means of the knowledge of the path. Herein, since penetration is preceded by understanding, it does not occur without understanding. And some understanding is related to penetration. And the wandering on in the round of rebirths, which is due to the absence of both, is the wandering on in the round of rebirths. That is why it is said in the text: â€œThrough failure to understand â€¦ you and I have wandered and circled thus far in this long courseâ€ . The running hither and thither is the running hither and thither in the sense of the taking up of rebirths. The wandering on is the wandering on in the round of rebirths by dying here and being reborn there. That is why it is said: â€œFrom realm to realm we have wandered thus farâ€ . Taking the words â€œwandering and circlingâ€ as referring to kamma, he said: â€œby you and meâ€ in the first analysis. But in the second analysis, taking them as referring to becoming, he said: â€œby meâ€ in the sense of the heartwood, and â€œby youâ€ in the sense of the outer bark.

translated: Some say that the words are only the syllables, but that is not so. For the words are the syllables because they distinguish the meaning, and the words are the syllables because they are what is distinguished by the syllables. The meaning is stated: the meaning of the words is stated. The connection is stated: the connection between the teaching as given and the teaching that follows is stated. The sequence is stated: the non-contradiction of the earlier and the later and the establishment of the distinction between them are stated. Thus the proper investigation of the words of the teaching, etc., and the grasping of them is the proper learning.
